Name: Six Times Solitude
Notes: Six humorous settings of the same poem 'Solitude' as if sung by different characters.
Long Description: Sechs humorvolle, unterschiedliche Fassungen des Gedichtes 'Solitude'. Six humorous settings of the same poem 'Solitude' as if sung by different characters.
Short Description: Six humorous settings of the same poem 'Solitude' as if sung by different characters.
